input:
![narrative-horizontal-small.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmTZMFet2z5s3jJbMQZqytYWhkgdgudVc3SQ3ci7y35aEy/narrative-horizontal-small.png)

Narrative network is NEO based social platform that have started their ICO at 20.02.2018.

Link to Narrative network: https://www.narrative.network/


![FireShot Capture 5 - Narrative Token Sale I Your Acco_ - https___tokensale.narrative.network_account.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmezgoisSHfwV2ADNS2AVR4GVUbwMcp1TXef2dLbFAQhLq/FireShot%20Capture%205%20-%20Narrative%20Token%20Sale%20I%20Your%20Acco_%20-%20https___tokensale.narrative.network_account.png)

I have took some screenshots from their whitepaper to introduce their idea:

Whitepaper link: https://assets.narrative.network/documents/narrative-network.pdf

![FireShot Capture 8 -  - https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYQtkczKVBm64b2yJBymocdtChr3YbahGvZopSV1GLp4Y/FireShot%20Capture%208%20-%20%20-%20https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png)

![FireShot Capture 2 -  - https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmW1ydzbiX6T2TzKPMwbM6PpmuumJcnDeskRESjXKDyzrX/FireShot%20Capture%202%20-%20%20-%20https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png)


![FireShot Capture 1 -  - https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUYM5z5pSdyp4eLaFrSZvwx3CY4n6dkU4dbsXmUNcaCcU/FireShot%20Capture%201%20-%20%20-%20https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png)

![FireShot Capture 3 -  - https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmPJgZSLLcPkUiMHACgeF38eXCLJJfLyATzoW6N5KxVAhQ/FireShot%20Capture%203%20-%20%20-%20https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png)

![FireShot Capture 4 -  - https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWkKy7Q1uRxz24c6cScyU4iyWQk3Rm3amuSk5BRapgeaT/FireShot%20Capture%204%20-%20%20-%20https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png)

![FireShot Capture 7 -  - https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXHKXgyKaxTcBJwAMT9sbXhbVwyGtpDqCTCwGBGomrDRh/FireShot%20Capture%207%20-%20%20-%20https___assets.narrative.network_documents_narrative-network.pdf.png)

Personally I was expecting that Steemit will get some competition, and healthy competition is always good. It push you to work harder and Steemit and Narrative users will benefit for sure. Steemit is way ahead at moment and Narrative will be fully functional at the and of this year, but I am sure that will be enough users for Narrative also, even it will not be serious competitor to Steemit anytime soon. 

For sure there will be more social networks this type in future and I am really happy to see  how blockchain technology is changing world.

Do you think that Narrative has chance to become successful social network?
I would like to hear your opinions about Narrative
result:
Narrative network is NEO based social platform that have started their ICO at 20.02.2018.

Link to Narrative network: https://www.narrative.network/

I have took some screenshots from their whitepaper to introduce their idea:

Whitepaper link: https://assets.narrative.network/documents/narrative-network.pdf

Personally I was expecting that Steemit will get some competition, and healthy competition is always good. It push you to work harder and Steemit and Narrative users will benefit for sure. Steemit is way ahead at moment and Narrative will be fully functional at the and of this year, but I am sure that will be enough users for Narrative also, even it will not be serious competitor to Steemit anytime soon.

For sure there will be more social networks this type in future and I am really happy to see how blockchain technology is changing world.

Do you think that Narrative has chance to become successful social network?
I would like to hear your opinions about Narrative
